resources.string: Med_TracK, a one stop solution for all health problems. The app is designed to facilitate both patients and doctors. With just a click, one can consult a doctor, get a prescription in accordance with their symptoms which is tracked using the Medibox and maintain their digital health records. Doctors can register on this app and provide safe and hassle free consultation, thereby minimizing the grave risk of getting infected. This app is truly the innovation we need during these troubled times.
